string.value:
The time between February and March is what many call the prime hunting season! Receive some hunting pointers from Scadur and become the best hunter on the block!#b

<Event Period>
March 15, 2010 - March 21, 2010

<How to Join the Event>
1. Receive the 2x EXP item that Scadur hands out once a week.
2. Use the item when in need of an extra boost of Luck.
3. Hunt away!

<Notes>
1. 2x EXP item will expire at midnight on Sunday.
2. New 2x item will become available the following Monday.

The time between February and March is what many call the prime hunting season! Receive some hunting pointers from Scadur and become the best hunter on the block!#b

<Event Period>
March 15, 2010 - March 21, 2010

<How to Join the Event>
1. Receive the 2x EXP item that Scadur hands out once a week.
2. Use the item when in need of an extra boost of Luck.
3. Hunt away!

<Notes>
1. 2x EXP item will expire at midnight on Sunday.
2. New 2x item will become available the following Monday.

The time between February and March is what many call the prime hunting season! Receive some hunting pointers from Scadur and become the best hunter on the block!#b

<Event Period>
March 15, 2010 - March 21, 2010

<How to Join the Event>
1. Receive the 2x EXP item that Scadur hands out once a week.
2. Use the item when in need of an extra boost of Luck.
3. Hunt away!

<Notes>
1. 2x EXP item will expire at midnight on Sunday.
2. New 2x item will become available the following Monday.

The new hunting season has begun! I have been waiting year-round for it to get this cold! Hmm? You don't know? Feb. 19th through Mar. 28th is the best time for hunting! If you miss that season, you're not a serious hunter. It's that important. You know, I can give you a special tip on how to hunt effectively. Are you interested?
Hey, people line up for miles to hear my secret for successful hunting. I sincerely hope you don't regret your decision, but you will.

It's called #bHunter's Luck#k. Use it when you need some luck. The EXP you earn through hunting will temporarily double when you do! The Hunter's Luck will disappear each Sunday, so I suggest you use it before then. Don't worry, you'll get a new one the Monday after.
